programme.title: Top Secret UFO Projects Declassified

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.desc: ...Britain. New. Grenfell Tower: James Nesbitt examines the Grenfell Tower fire. On 14 June 2017, the 24-storey apartment block went up in flames leading to 71 deaths. (S1, ep 6

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There

programme.title: Shed And Buried
programme.desc: Henry and Sam are invited to look around the workshops of the National Motorcycle Museum. The guys consider bidding on a 1926 Ariel and a 1927 BSA. S4, Ep3

programme.title: Shed And Buried
programme.desc: Sam and Henry travel to Leicestershire to meet former motorbike racer Eddie Roberts. His impressive collection includes a rare 1962 Greeves Sportsman. S4, Ep4

programme.title: Shed And Buried
programme.desc: The guys are in Herefordshire to look around a farmer's eclectic collection. Henry sets his sights on a Nuffield tractor, while Sam wants an antique bird scarer. S4, Ep5

programme.title: Combat Dealers

programme.title: Combat Dealers
programme.desc: Dunkirk. Bruce finds a picture in his attic from Dunkirk, given to him by a soldier who was there. Bruce and Hus go on a hunt for kit that tells the real story of the evacuation. S4, Ep3

programme.title: Combat Dealers
programme.desc: Battle Of The Bulge. A client wants a German half-track armoured personnel carrier converted into a Pioneer variant, used by the German army during the Battle of the Bulge. S4, Ep4

programme.title: Combat Dealers
